transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Haa sir aawaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haa bataiye.
Customer: Sir mai ek baar fir se manually isme search kar raha tha aapko jo leads hain jo aap bata rahe hain. To kuch lead mujhe jaise mai search karta hu to mujhe dikhti hain. Ab mujhe aap ye bataiyega unme dikkat kya hai? Jo lead mujhe dikhti hain yaha pe.
Executive: Kon si lead batao?
Customer: Jaise mai Hivare Mohar power jab mai search karta hu manually to mujhe search karti hai Grand Doctor Immuno Ayurvedic Immunity Booster, thik hai?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Grand Doctor Immuno Ayurvedic Immunity Booster.
Executive: Wo apne kaam ki nahi hai.
Customer: Usme kya dikkat hai us lead me?
Executive: Jab apne paas hai hi nahi maal to denge kya?
Customer: Thik hai to ye Hivare Mohar power me nahi aata?
Executive: Hivare Mohar power alag cheez hai.
Customer: Thik hai aur jo Supremo Immunity Booster ek lead hai ye bhi.
Executive: Wo bhi apne kaam ki cheez nahi hai, nahi hai.
Customer: Ek hai Tatvi Dhatu Paushtik Churn for Immunity Boosting Powder.
Executive: Wo bhi apne paas nahi hai, nahi hai ye bhi.
Customer: Thik hai ab mai dusra product search karke dekhta hu. Mujhe one by one aap recording line ke baad bata dijiye.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Agla maine search kiya aapka Hivare Mohar Power Premium karke ek product aapne dala hua hai, thik hai?
Executive: Haa, haa, haa, haa.
Customer: Jab hum ise search karte hain.
Executive: Haa.
Customer: To same lead dikh rahi hai, thik hai. Isko chod deta hu mai, agla product dekhta hu.
Ye bhi Hivare Mohar Power hai fir hai Nutri Charge, thik hai?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Nutri Charge. Isme to deal karte hain na?
Arre yaar mai kya batau, mere ko aisa lagta hai tum kar nahi paoge kuch bhi.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir dekho.
Hello.
Executive: Haa.
Customer: Isme jo mujhe dikh raha hai Neurolook OD Force Nutritional Supplement.
Executive: Arre mai kya keh raha hu. Mai mai batau aapko?
Customer: Bataiye.
Executive: Mujhe khana hai aalu, thik hai? Aur aap khila rahe ho ratalu. To ratalu nahi chahiye, aalu hi chahiye, samajh gaye? Jo cheez hai na jo cheez apne paas hai bas usi ki requirement chahiye apne ko. Faltu ya aaju baju ki nahi chahiye. Jisme baat karta hu to samne wala utha ke mana kar deta hai, maine dekh liya baat karke.
Customer: To sir ye lead
Executive: Fir aisa agar lead nahi aa rahi hai to lead generate hi nahi ho rahi hogi na IndiaMART pe.
Customer: Nahi ho rahi to kyu nahi ho rahi bhai? Yahi to puchna chah raha hu kyu nahi ho rahi? Aap jab mere ko plan diya tha tab saaf bataya tha bola ab humne hamare IndiaMART ko AI ke through kar diya hai to sab kuch aapko ekdam accurate milega.
Executive: Sir customer search nahi karega to hum bhi kaha se la denge sir batao aap.
Customer: Arre search khoob karte hain yaar. Ye bhi dekh liya maine.
Koi nayi cheez thodi hai yaar. Iski jabardast demand hai.
Trade me bhi dekh leta hu sir ek baar.
Kyuki mai aapke case ke bare me hi baat karne gaya tha seriously.
Fir ek baar search kar lete hain dobara.
Hivare Mohar Power search kar raha hu isme yahi aa rahi hai fir. Thik hai koi teen me se aapke kaam ki nahi hai. Uric app, watch mukti, yellow bhi.
Sir fir aapko wait karna hoga jab ye matlab jaise
Hello. Ye jo problem hai na ye IndiaMART ke application me hai. Mai application ke liye pichle saal se kehta raha hu isko sudhar karo.
Executive: Sir application me problem nahi hai aur bhi log to kaam karte hi hain na.
Customer: Nahi problem hai. Are ye na market me hi generate nahi ho rahi hogi lead isliye aapke paas nahi aa pa rahi. Are is baat ko chhodo yaar jabardast lead hai, jabardast demand hai. Mai kaise maan lu?
Executive: Sir agar lead generate hogi to aapko aapke profile me dikhayegi aur
Customer: Mai 10 mobile se search karta hu. Ab 10 mobile se search karta hu to uski lead banni chahiye na wo bhi nahi ban rahi lo bolo.
Executive: Maan lo kisi wajah se thik hai aapke profile me nahi bhi aati, mai samajh gaya aapki baat. To waha pe to aani chahiye na trade wagera pe. By lead hai hi nahi isliye nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Are kuch bhi nahi are ye aapke software ki mistake hai yaar mai dekh chuka hu achi tarah se. Sab tarah se intezaam karke dekh chuka hu dekh search kar karke.
Ab batao sir kya kare?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Believes the IndiaMART application has issues.

- Questions why leads aren't generating despite searches.



Resolution:

- Executive stated leads depend on customer searches.

- Executive mentioned Hivare Mohar Power is different.

- Executive said customer needs to wait for leads.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, application, search, indiaMART
